title: Darker Than Black: Ryuusei no Gemini
alternative_title: Darker than Black: Gemini of the Meteor, DARKER THAN BLACK 流星の双子
description: Two years have passed since Hei and Yin escaped the Syndicate after the events of the first season. Making their way to Russia, Hei encounters a young girl named Suou Pavlichenko, whose family is gradually pulled into the war between contractors and various intelligence factions. Meanwhile, Kirihara Misaki has quit her position in Foreign Affairs to begin her own investigations into Hei, the Contractors and the Syndicate.
